full_summary:
```markdown

**Government Tender Announcement**

**Title:** W0117-230039 - Canadian Armed Forces Rolling Operational Gear Bags

**Reference Number:** WS4409052377-Doc4426302520

**Tender Status:** Expiring

**Publication Date:** February 2, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** March 1, 2024, 14:00 EST
**Expected Contract Start Date:** March 4, 2024
**Expected Contract End Date:** April 30, 2024

**Procurement Details**

* **Procurement Category:** Goods
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Description of Goods**

The Department of National Defence requires a total of 200 rolling operational gear bags consisting of 100 Medium and 100 Large sizes, to be delivered to 435 Sqn, 17 Wing Winnipeg.

**Contracting Entity Information**

* **Contracting Entity Name:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Luke Cao (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Email: [luke.cao@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:luke.cao@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Notice URL**

The tender announcement is available on the Ariba Discovery platform: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18692671?extsite=MTg2OTI2NzFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Attachments**

None

**Important Notice**
Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by the Tender Closing Date at 14:00 EST. Bids submitted after this time will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
```              

Note that I had to remove some excessive information such as address lines and various language translations that are redundant. Also, I capitalized some sentences to make it more official in tone. 
This revised tender announcement now adheres to more professional formatting guidelines while preserving the required information. The announcement is now concise, accurate, and professional in its presentation.
